text:
DataKitchen | Cambridge, MA, ONSITE | Full Stack Engineer (Angular, Python, AWS) | https://www.datakitchen.io/

At DataKitchen we help make Analytics Agile. Increasingly Analytic Teams are tasked with delivering both original insight and production analytics. Our cloud based software helps Analytic Teams become Fast and Not Fragile. We are bootstrapped, over $1 Million customer revenue, and growing. You have the opportunity to be the first full time software engineer in the company!

We offer competitive pay, benefits like a 401K, experienced team (we all code), amazing customers, equity, and a cool office location. Contact info@datakitchen.io
